description:
There are three of the Minami sisters: Haruka, Kana and Chiaki, who have an average life. The girls only have each other to depend on and help each other get through everything from love confessions to cooking.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Femboy
tags.description: Features a boy who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of girls.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

node.description:
__Height:__ 158cm
__Nickname:__ Minorin (みのりん)

[Official Website](https://www.minorichihara.com/) | [Profile (HoriPro)](http://www.horipro-international.com/artist/chihara) | [Website (Lantis)](https://www.lantis.jp/artist/chiharaminori/) | [Blog](https://lineblog.me/minori_parade/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/minori_contact) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/minori_chihara/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Minori_Chihara) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/茅原実里)

Minori Chihara is a Japanese voice actress and singer.

On April 2, 2021, she announced via her blog that she was taking an indefinite hiatus on her singing activities at the end of the year, but continuing to voice act.

__Agency:__ Aoni Production

[Profile](https://www.aoni.co.jp/search/inoue-marina.html) | [Blog](http://yaplog.jp/marinavi/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Mari_navi) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/17179.html) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marina_Inoue) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E4%BA%95%E4%B8%8A%E9%BA%BB%E9%87%8C%E5%A5%88)

A voice actress and singer. She is signed onto Sony Music Japan's Aniplex division as a music artist. Formerly under the agency Sigma Seven, she transferred to Aoni Pro in 2022.

**Non-Anime Roles:**
- Pallas - Arknights (VG)
- Elysia - Honkai Impact 3rd (VG)
- Yanqing - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)
- Helm - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Zhu Yuan  - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)

__[Profile (Haikyo)](https://haikyo.co.jp/profile/profile.php?ActorID=11916) | [Twitter](http://twitter.com/rinasatoh)__

__Non-anime roles:__
- Guilty - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Eula - Genshin Impact (VG)
- USS California - Azur Lane (VG)
- Caesar King - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)
- Helena Martin - Reverse Collapse: Code Name Bakery (VG)

__[Website](http://kikuyatomoki.com/)__

__Birthplace:__ Mitaka, Tokyo, Japan

__Introduction:__
Tomoki Kikuya is a Japanese composer and arranger, who works for music studio Popholic. His brother Kikuya Hiroki (菊谷宏樹), is the director of TVK's saku saku music show.

__Biography:__
Kikuya started a career as guitarist in the music band Mustang A.K.A under Sony Records. Later he was part of Funanori. Starting from 2005 Kikuya decided to focus on working as a music composer and arranger. He has arranged and composed several songs featured in anime since then, starting with theme songs for Pani Poni Dash.
Not to be confused with the other director [Takashi Yamazaki](https://anilist.co/staff/297520/Takashi-Yamazaki)
Debuted with "Kyo no Go no Ni" on Nov. 16, 2002.

He began playing classical piano at the age of 5 and learned other instruments from his experience playing with a brass band (flute) and rock band (drums). After graduating from the Nihon University College of Arts he worked as a composer at KOEI, working on the music for a number of their games. He left the company in 2006 and has since been composing for TV, anime, and movies.
Affiliated with [Wit Studio](https://anilist.co/studio/858/).
Affiliated with [Wit Studio](https://anilist.co/studio/858/).
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/yasunoriebina)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/xexex36) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yoshihiro_watanabe1971/) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/渡邊義弘_(アニメーター%29)

An animator, character designer and adult game artist.

Animates on rare occasions.

[Blog](http://aminon.asablo.jp/blog/) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%82%A2%E3%83%9F%E3%83%8E%E3%83%86%E3%83%84%E3%83%AD%E3%83%BC) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tetsur%C5%8D_Amino)

Tetsurou Amino is a Japanese director, screenwriter and storyboard artist.

In 1988, he started using his name in katakana.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Amichanwakannai)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/koyasumi111)

Johann Sebastian Bach was a German composer, organist, harpsichordist, violist, and violinist whose sacred and secular works for choir, orchestra, and solo instruments drew together the strands of the Baroque period and brought it to its ultimate maturity.    

(Source: Wikipedia)
